org.puredata.android.service

Class PdService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • org.puredata.android.service.PdService

  • public class PdService
extends Service
    PdService allows applications to run Pure Data as a (local) service, with foreground priority if desired.
    Author:
    Peter Brinkmann (peter.brinkmann@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getBufferSizeMillis

        public float getBufferSizeMillis()
        Returns:
        the current audio buffer size in milliseconds (approximate value; the exact value is a multiple of the Pure Data tick size (64 samples))

      • getInputChannels

        public int getInputChannels()
        Returns:
        number of input channels

      • getOutputChannels

        public int getOutputChannels()
        Returns:
        number of output channels

      • getSampleRate

        public int getSampleRate()
        Returns:
        current sample rate

      • initAudio

        public void initAudio(int srate,
             int nic,
             int noc,
             float millis)
               throws IOException
        Initialize Pure Data and audio thread
        Parameters:
        srate - sample rate
        nic - number of input channels
        noc - number of output channels
        millis - audio buffer size in milliseconds
        Throws:
        IOException - if the audio parameters are not supported by the device

      • startAudio

        public void startAudio()
        Start the audio thread without foreground privileges

      • startAudio

        public void startAudio(Intent intent,
              int icon,
              String title,
              String description)
        Start the audio thread with foreground privileges
        Parameters:
        intent - intent to be triggered when the user selects the notification of the service
        icon - icon representing the notification
        title - title of the notification
        description - description of the notification

      • stopAudio

        public void stopAudio()
        Stop the audio thread

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the audio thread is running

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)

        public void onCreate()

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
